website_summaries.verdict: An energy efficient model that performs well and comes at a modest price.
pros: A good fan that's powerful enough to pull air through effectively yet doesn't use much electricity

customer_reviews.title: Nice quiet fan for a lot less than Panasonic
customer_reviews.text: Product came with crossbars, which is nice - didn't think I would need, but ended up using. Someone wrote about how they couldn't get the wiring box back together when using a metal romex clamp - I didn't have that problem with a plastic romex clamp. As far as use - I don't hear the motor, but I think the noise I do hear is the sound of air moving. Not loud or disturbing, but it is noticeable. The manual says not to use with a solid state fan control. Just for reference I did use a Lutron occupancy sensor switch, connected with my light fixture without any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Jonny MN

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, no whine
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 80 CFM exhaust fan for my small half bath. The fan is vey quiet. One reviewer commented on a high pitched whine as the motors ramped up. High pitches are very annoying to me, but I do not hear any such whine. My contractor installed it in the ceiling when it was too deep for the wall. The contractor had no problems installing it. I like the small front plate -- a large front plate would have been overwhelming in such a small room.
customer_reviews.author: Engineer

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and Great Performance
customer_reviews.text: Finally got these things installed in the ceilings of both upstairs bathrooms. I wouldn't say it was the most pleasant experience working in the attic but it did mount to the joists securely with the included support bars and connected to a 4 inch insulated flex duct. once installed though it is very quiet and does a great job keeping the moisture off the mirror and from collecting on the bathroom surfaces
customer_reviews.author: Lance E Deaver

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Received on right time and package was well protected. Quality is good. Value for money spend. Its my 4th year I have been using this. No issues so far. I do recommend this sincerely. Appreciate much if you could provide a response if you feel this review is helpful. I’m trying to be honest in my review.
customer_reviews.author: Jose C

customer_reviews.title: Value Buy & Better Than Panasonic
customer_reviews.text: As I saw the review about how this fan saved one man's marriage (LOL) I decided to buy two of this vent instead of waiting for the Panasonic vent that I had previously installed and very happy about it. This is a much a value buy and provide more functionality (build in sensors) comparing to Panasonic 80/110 CFM. Due to its CFM, the noise is lower than Panasonic 80/110 CFM as well. I would not hesitate to recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: HotPiglet

customer_reviews.title: Good fan but bad screw hole
customer_reviews.text: There is still noise but this fan is much better than the builder grade fans and its noise is not annoying at all. This fan is designed to replace the builder grade fan. so installation the fan is easier than taking down the old fan. The only complaint I have is the wire cover plate screw hole is too small and installing the screw is a pain. I spent 30 minutes just trying to screw in that tiny litter screw. Another complaint I have is the exhaust damper does not shut off the air 100%. I think the design should be improved.
customer_reviews.author: lao wang

customer_reviews.title: Item didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Mounted fan , then tried it . It didn’t work. Sent item back, my refund wasn’t full. They refunded me what I would of payed if I bought 3 of the fans, I guess . What a joke ! What a way to make money ! I payed there full price ! I should get that back.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Brown

customer_reviews.title: Fan works great and replaced an older builders grade Broan fan that ...
customer_reviews.text: Fan works great and replaced an older builders grade Broan fan that i had in my bathroom. I had attic access which made the installation much easier. Essentially removed the old one, screwed this one in, made the electrical connections and taped the duct..that's all that was needed. I did hope it was a tad bit quieter but overall its much better than the lawn mower of a fan i had before :) Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Peter B

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't work as well as the $18 fan it replaced.
customer_reviews.text: This is installed in a 6' x 8' bathroom and doesn't clear the steam out of the room even with the door open a few inches. As a matter of fact, it drips condensation water drops if one takes a hot shower. I'm very sad to say it doesn't work as well as the $18 fan it replaced. It was professionally installed and is fully functional. I wish I could return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Product at a great Price
customer_reviews.text: Quiet, at under 2 sonos, installation was standard and very nice product for the price. Only downside is it has a delayed start which is not a bad thing ( some high end panasonics do the same thing) , just undesirable to a few as some clients want to hear fan as soon as it turns on. Overall good product
customer_reviews.author: Amari Construction LLC

customer_reviews.title: seems quiet,construction no finished at the momet.
customer_reviews.text: as I said, construction is not finished at the moment. the fan will be used to recirculate heat from a 20 ft ceiling down to the floor when barn is finished. That's all. So far it tests well.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Super quiet
customer_reviews.text: I first thought this fan was not working it is so quiet. The fan housing has mounting flanges so I had to install it from the attic. It's not a low cost fan but I think it worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: John R.

customer_reviews.title: Solid exhaust fan
customer_reviews.text: Actually using this in a manufacturing setting to exhaust fumes created by the process. Works great, good size and removes all the fumes.
customer_reviews.author: William P. Meyers

customer_reviews.title: Noxious emissions, be gone
customer_reviews.text: Successfully vents malodorous gases to the environment without sounding like there's a Blackhawk hovering overhead. I'm happy, and so is everyone else.
customer_reviews.author: CH

customer_reviews.title: The strong and silent type
customer_reviews.text: Fairly good suction and very quiet. So quiet in fact, I have to look at the little led light on the fan to verify it’s actually on and then look outside to see the vent louvers flap in the air stream.
customer_reviews.author: Mendel Kaplan

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet
customer_reviews.text: liked it so much i purchased another for me next renovation. This is in my home and I'm an electrician.
customer_reviews.author: J Lo

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit
customer_reviews.text: Great unit. Nice and quiet. We starting to finish the last bathroom and since the other ones that we have are nice and quiet figured we would stay with the same.
customer_reviews.author: Torri M.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome flow, well made, almost too quiet (gets left on).
customer_reviews.text: Works great, but it's actually too quiet! Can barely hear it, even with the door open, so we leave it on by accident all the time. I'm seriously considering a timer switch..
customer_reviews.author: R. W.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great fan at a very reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great fan at a very reasonable price, a comparable fan at a home improvement store would have been in the range of $100. The noise is incredibly low for the amount of air it moves.
customer_reviews.author: W

customer_reviews.title: Excelent choice
customer_reviews.text: Easy installation, coming with brackets also and if you don't use it with light on the same circuit u will never know it is working or not because its so quiet.
customer_reviews.author: #Maya

customer_reviews.title: So QUIET you may FORGET you have it ON!
customer_reviews.text: Great vent. Extremely quiet and don't even know when it is running. Has been left on a couple of times since it is so quiet. No more sweat on the walls from the steam.
customer_reviews.author: MikeTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Exhaust bathroom fan.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, connected to light switch was the best way for our use.
customer_reviews.author: ricdic

customer_reviews.title: Don't expect a silent fan and you won't be disappointed. It is quiet
customer_reviews.text: Don't expect a silent fan and you won't be disappointed. It is quiet, about as quiet as the super expensive ones we install in custom homes. I've had it for about a year in my personal house and I am happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: TCorn

customer_reviews.title: Slow raving up.
customer_reviews.text: Slow raving up. But, works good in my 5' X 10' bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Bare bones item
customer_reviews.text: This is a great unit, quiet, powerful, small housing, slim grill. But from a company like Delta I'd expect a few more items in the box. I received the vent, and 4 mounting rails, nothing else but packing materials. No instructions, mounting screws, wire nuts.....
customer_reviews.author: MichiganMatt290

customer_reviews.title: doesn't move as much air as I thought
customer_reviews.text: I oversized the fan for my bathroom with this unit. It should easily remove the steam from showering, but it doesn't. It is quiet.
customer_reviews.author: fireman

customer_reviews.title: Great price on a great fan
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace original fan which fit perfectly to the existing fan slot. Fan runs ultra quiet, so much so you don't know it's on and no more steamed mirrors or sweating while drying off. Great price on a great fan. Highly recommended for the product quality and the price.
customer_reviews.author: SED

customer_reviews.title: Quiet air removal
customer_reviews.text: Really good product. Sounds so much better than the El cheapo fans that most homes have. Nicely built and easy to install. I highly recommend this product. I Will buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: azscib

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Basically a direct replacement for a prior fan. This one moves more air and is quieter.
customer_reviews.author: NKurth

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and quiet
customer_reviews.text: I was worried that it would be difficult to install since the bathroom was in an older house with no attic access. Installation was easy, and it was so quiet I had to check that it was working.
customer_reviews.author: jaquee

customer_reviews.title: I like them.
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet - with slow motor start up you hardly know they are running! I like them.
customer_reviews.author: shannon

customer_reviews.title: but still an easy install.
customer_reviews.text: Product description says "loudness rating of 0.6 sones". Box that it came in says 0.8 sones. Was larger than I expected, but still an easy install.
customer_reviews.author: M.S.

customer_reviews.title: Quiet Operating Fart Fan
customer_reviews.text: Quiet operation. Easy to mount for most part. Had to access attic though. DC motor starts up slow and gradually increases speed. Excellent price paid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install (includes instructions), clean look and very quite.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Whitaker

customer_reviews.title: Very happy. Fan is very quiet as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Very happy. Fan is very quiet as advertised. It appears to be very sturdy and installation was fairly easy.
customer_reviews.author: Casper

customer_reviews.title: Great retrofit fan or new install
customer_reviews.text: Great fan, quiet, retrofit easy install, replaced 3 Broan-Nutone bath exhaust fans, extremely noisy and ugly Highly recommend this fan
customer_reviews.author: Wenny

customer_reviews.title: Nice quiet fan
customer_reviews.text: Nice quiet fan. Was easy to install and wire up. About 1/10 as loud as the 25 year old fan that it replaced. Sturdy mounting holes make for solid mount.
customer_reviews.author: NY CUSTOMER

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install uses 1/4 of the electricity of my ...
customer_reviews.text: Is it on, if it was not for the green led you may never know! Easy to install uses 1/4 of the electricity of my last noisy fan.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Install tips
customer_reviews.text: Purchasing mounting rails was a must for me, exhaust vent exited the wrong direction for my install. Love the fan!
customer_reviews.author: me2

customer_reviews.title: Quite and efficient
customer_reviews.text: This is a very quite fan which is excellent for a small bathroom. We have a 40 sq ft bath where this works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Devesh S

customer_reviews.title: Good value and easy to install. Seems to work good.
customer_reviews.text: Yep easy to install and does the job of venting the laundry room from excess moisture and stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Just Richard

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last a year
customer_reviews.text: The fan went out in less than a year. It was professionally installed. Still shows power but the fan does not work.
customer_reviews.author: mynameisjz

customer_reviews.title: Super quiet. Wish I had replaced my old noisy ...
customer_reviews.text: Super quiet. Wish I had replaced my old noisy fans years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Louis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: easy to install and it is very quiet compared to the old one.
customer_reviews.author: JCL

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed fan that runs very quietly and is well-designed ...
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed fan that runs very quietly and is well-designed. It runs 24 by 7 to move air from the upstairs of my house to the downstairs
customer_reviews.author: SoWhatIsIt

customer_reviews.title: Much quieter than the fan it replaced. My mom ...
customer_reviews.text: Much quieter than the fan it replaced. My mom visited and thought it was broken because she didn't hear it when it turned on.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: excellent value and well made
customer_reviews.text: Ramps up gradually to full power; green indicator light lets you know when it is on; whisper quiet, yet more than enough for a small bathroom; excellent value and well made; all in all a very good fan
customer_reviews.author: Buttwheat

customer_reviews.title: The only trick is the switch issue -- but otherwise am happy
customer_reviews.text: We had to replace the exhaust fan that was in our home... THAT old fan was louder than an airport hanger. This fan had the same footprint as the previous one, which meant that it could be installed with relative ease. We did not set it up for both speeds-- it's only on one switch, and we couldn't add a second in that area. I probably would not have purchased it if I had known that (ideally) it would be wired for two switches. However, the electrician installing this just set it to only turn to high. It's reasonably quiet. So we're happier than when it felt like an airplane hanger...
customer_reviews.author: Dr Rutabega

customer_reviews.title: The fan works like a dream
customer_reviews.text: The fan works like a dream. We purchased it because the original fan was under rated for the bathroom of the house we just purchased. The review on how to replace an EXISTING fan helped us immensely!!! The installation instructions that come with the fan are good only for new construction.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Samson

customer_reviews.title: pretty quiet fan
customer_reviews.text: pretty quiet fan. Takes about 5 seconds to get all the way up to speed. Overall I am pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: roachmaster

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this air vent/exhaust for my bathroom
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet machine! It takes time to start up, which is why I take away a star. But it is quiet, and seems to be doing its job well. Very pleased with this air vent/exhaust for my bathroom!
customer_reviews.author: Rimsha Syed

customer_reviews.title: starts up and operates exactly how required. Much quieter ...
customer_reviews.text: starts up and operates exactly how required. Much quieter than the original fan in the bathroom. The old one could be heard through out the house....no privacy there.
customer_reviews.author: sparrow

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Super quiet and easy to install. It quickly clears the bathroom of odors and humidity.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Clark

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: It is soo quite! I have to look for the little green light to even know that it's on, it's so quite. Fast shipping. Easy to install, instruction were great. Awesome product and cheaper than Menards :)
customer_reviews.author: Lia

customer_reviews.title: Noticeable whine, weak exhaust fan.
customer_reviews.text: The fan arrived in a fairly simple package. I had it installed by my handyman and it looks ok, but on my first shower could not keep steam off my mirror with the door closed. Furthermore, the fan is not loud per say but has a very noticeable high pitched whirring whine noise that I can hear around the house if left on. I'm pretty disappointed by the vent fan overall, as it does not vent my bathroom as I imagined (smaller than the recommended sq footage appropriate for) and is more audibly noticeable than it was billed to be.
customer_reviews.author: redsoxnation

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: This has been installed for about a month. It works well and is really quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Briggs

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Installation was fairly easy. works quietly and moves air nicely.
customer_reviews.author: D Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best and quietest bathroom exhaust fan with auto humidity sensing ever!
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: Be sure to follow all directions.
customer_reviews.text: Be sure to follow the installation directions. Remember that you can remove the exhaust shroud to access the mounting holes. Also, if you don't have a straight run of exhaust pipe you may get some howling above the rated <0.3 sones.I put a 4" elbow directly on the exhaust shroud. Now I am waiting for cooler weather to redo the exhaust system.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Great fans, I've got 2 installed in my bathrooms ...
customer_reviews.text: Great fans, I've got 2 installed in my bathrooms and they work well. With a vent through the roof the fan is a little louder - likely cause it strains more. I think I'd be annoyed by the fan if it were any quieter than it is. As it is, if the furnace or ac is on you can't hear the fan. It's a good mix of quiet with just enough noise so you can tell it's on.
customer_reviews.author: J. Calkins

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet and efficient fan
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fan to replace a cheap Home Depot bought fan that sounded like a jet engine starting up. When I first turned this fan on I couldn't believe how quiet it is. It moves more air than the old fan yet you can hardly hear it running. It's so quiet while its running I often forget it is running until I see the little green LED lit at the grill. This is a great fan, I will be replacing all my bathroom fans with this model. The installation is also much easier that that of other brand fans I have installed. I will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: S. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quiet and really moves the air in my 90 start bath
customer_reviews.author: wes

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Installed and works as stated. It is very quiet. It keeps our 50 sq ft bathroom steam free no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Two are fine, work well and are very quiet
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these exhaust fans, not with humidity control, for my newly constructed home. Two are fine, work well and are very quiet, The third one in my guest bath is horrible. It turns itself on without touching the wall switch and runs on and off about 18-20 hours a day. I now have to have this taken out and replaced. I am very unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: FJS.

customer_reviews.title: Quiet fan but doesn't work as well as expected. ...
customer_reviews.text: Quiet fan but doesn't work as well as expected. Has trouble keeping our 5x7 bathroom fog free during showers... Should have purchased a 100 camera fan I suppose...
customer_reviews.author: T. B.

customer_reviews.title: This fan works very well and meets all specifications. ...
customer_reviews.text: This fan works very well and meets all specifications. It can be heard if started without any other background noise, but if the shower is running and I turn it on it is virtually silent.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry B. Power

customer_reviews.title: Works great and was easy to do
customer_reviews.text: Works great and was easy to do...only because I had to buy it to replace the exact one in my home. That one got fried by lightening strike!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.text: Nice and quite, quick install I did not quit until I finished... (sorry had to do it)
customer_reviews.author: FTodd1

customer_reviews.title: No air movement
customer_reviews.text: We had the fan installed. I literally had a tissue paper an inch from the fan and there was no air movement. It's suppose to 80 cfm. Bad product
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Still noisy. I wish I had got the Panasonic one with 0.3 sones
customer_reviews.author: shmily

customer_reviews.title: it too noise, it not 0. 6 level ...
customer_reviews.text: it too noise , it not 0.6 level . it should be 2.5 or 3.0 noise level . lack of accesory to hold the fan . dont buy it .
customer_reviews.author: Lieu Huynh

customer_reviews.title: Advertised as. 6 sones but. 8 sones is ...
customer_reviews.text: Advertised as .6 sones but .8 sones is printed on the box??? Probably wouldn't make any different but I specifically bought this one cause it advertised as such. Just corrects the typo so the next person won't get surprised!
customer_reviews.author: Nguyen

product_meta.title: Delta Electronics Delta BreezGreenBuilder GBR80 80 CFM Exhaust Bath Fan, 4" duct
product_meta.description:
Size:80 CFM| Style:Fan OnlyThe Delta Breez GreenBuilder GBR80 is the perfect combination of power, quality and performance in a bath fan, and at a value price. Air flow of 80 CFM with loudness rating of 0.6 sones. Features a DC brushless fan motor for superior reliability and efficiency, and extremely low power consumption. The fan operates using 10.5 Watts with an efficiency rating of 7.6 CFM per Watt. Easy to install; smaller size than most performance fans on the market. ENERGY STAR qualified and HVI certified.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Breez Ventilation Fan combines several design innovations, including a switching power supply and DC brushless motor to provide a quieter solution with energy savings up to 74% compared to similar products. The Breez Ventilation Fan is easy to install
feature_bullets: LED light indicator alert for cleaning
Noise level at less than 0.8 sones
ENERGY STAR qualified with DC Motor technology

specifications.Warranty Description: Limited 3 year warranty manufacturer defects, offered by manufacturer
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars817 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
